snippet: The league's trade deadline is Feb. 27. Playoff-bound teams will stand pat or stock up, and some struggling clubs will cash in.
abstract: The league's trade deadline is Feb. 27. Playoff-bound teams will stand pat or stock up, and some struggling clubs will cash in.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Separating Buyers From Sellers as Trade Deadline Nears
headline.print_headline: Separating Buyers From Sellers as Trade Deadline Nears
